title: Create or update an container resource with base manifest

args: while true; do echo hello; sleep 10;done

kubernetes.base:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webserver
  namespace: app-scoped
  labels:
    app: webserver
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.14.2
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
